table.name: invoice_equipment_detail
table.description: One record per piece of equipment per shipment on the invoice.  Equipment that is related to the shipment for which this invoice is related.

columns.name: INVOICE_GID
columns.description: The GID for the invoice.

columns.name: SEQ_NUMBER
columns.description: Internal database sequence number related to each invoice equipment entry.

columns.name: EQUIPMENT_INITIAL_NUMBER
columns.description: The Equipment Initial/Number field is a concatenation of equipment initial and equipment number. The initial is a mark that is registered with national or international authorities that is associated with a specific owner.

columns.name: S_EQUIPMENT_GID
columns.description: The GID for the shipment equipment.

columns.name: EQUIPMENT_PREFIX
columns.description: The prefix of the equipment that was used for the shipment that relates to this invoice.

columns.name: EQUIPMENT_NUMBER
columns.description: The number for the equipment.

columns.name: ISO_EQUIPMENT_TYPE_IDENTIFIER
columns.description: The ISO equipment type identifier.

columns.name: DESCRIPTION_CODE
columns.description: Description code.

columns.name: EQUIPMENT_OWNER_IDENTIFIER
columns.description: The identifier of the equipment owner.

columns.name: OWNERSHIP_CODE
columns.description: Ownership code.

columns.name: LENGTH
columns.description: The length of the equipment.

columns.name: LENGTH_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The unit of measure for the LENGTH.

columns.name: LENGTH_BASE
columns.description: The length of the equipment in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: WIDTH
columns.description: The width of the equipment.

columns.name: WIDTH_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The unit of measure for the WIDTH.

columns.name: WIDTH_BASE
columns.description: The width of the equipment in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: HEIGHT
columns.description: The height of the equipment.

columns.name: HEIGHT_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The unit of measure for the HEIGHT.

columns.name: HEIGHT_BASE
columns.description: The height of the equipment in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: WEIGHT
columns.description: The weight of the equipment.

columns.name: WEIGHT_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The unit of measure for the WEIGHT.

columns.name: WEIGHT_BASE
columns.description: The weight of the equipment in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: VOLUME
columns.description: The volume of the equipment.

columns.name: VOLUME_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The unit of measure for the VOLUME.

columns.name: VOLUME_BASE
columns.description: The volume of the equipment in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: TARE_WEIGHT
columns.description: Weight of equipment when empty.

columns.name: TARE_WEIGHT_UOM_CODE
columns.description: Unit of measure for the tare weight.

columns.name: TARE_WEIGHT_BASE
columns.description: The tare weight in base units.

columns.name: DUNNAGE
columns.description: Dunnage.

columns.name: DUNNAGE_UOM_CODE
columns.description: Dunnage unit of measure code.

columns.name: DUNNAGE_BASE
columns.description: Dunnage in base unit of measure.

columns.name: UNIT_COUNT
columns.description: Unit count.

columns.name: WEIGHT_QUALIFIER
columns.description: Weight qualifier.

columns.name: MINIMUM_TEMPERATURE
columns.description: The minimum temperature for the equipment.

columns.name: MIN_TEMP_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The minimum temperature unit of measure.

columns.name: MINIMUM_TEMPERATURE_BASE
columns.description: The minimum temperature in base units.

columns.name: MAXIMUM_TEMPERATURE
columns.description: The maximum temperature for the equipment.

columns.name: MAX_TEMP_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The maximum temperature unit of measure.

columns.name: MAXIMUM_TEMPERATURE_BASE
columns.description: The maximum temperature in base units.

columns.name: PERCENT_HUMIDITY_ALLOWED
columns.description: The maximum percentage of humidity allowed for the equipment.

columns.name: VENT_SETTING_CODE
columns.description: The vent setting code.

columns.name: WEIGHT_ALLOWANCE
columns.description: The regulatory maximum weight for the equipment.

columns.name: WEIGHT_ALLOWANCE_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The weight allowance unit of measure.

columns.name: WEIGHT_ALLOWANCE_BASE
columns.description: The weight allowance in base units.

columns.name: DOMAIN_NAME
columns.description: Database domain where this data is stored.

columns.name: INSERT_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data insert user.

columns.name: INSERT_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of data insert.

columns.name: UPDATE_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data update user.

columns.name: UPDATE_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of the most recent data update.
